How Soapbox Works

A powerful way to go from merchandise to social impact

  • 1.

    Create and sell custom, branded merchandise

    Soapbox provides a variety of products, such as t-shirts, necklaces, bracelets, and phone-cases that can be customized and sold by your foundation.

    • Product design assistance
    • Custom storefront for foundation
    • Foundation branding
    View example foundation storefront
  • 2.

    Donate sales proceeds to your foundation

    Soapbox makes it simple to give a portion (or all) of the proceeds from each sale of your merchandise to your foundation or one of our nonprofit partners.

    • Custom donation percentages
    • Automatic donations after every sale
    • Soapbox matching donation for all purchases*

    We add up number of products sold and make a monthly donation (approx. 10% of our production costs) to client's foundation

  • 3.

    Grow your foundation and leave an impact

    After your merchandise is sold and donations are made—we will continue to assist you in making your foundation a life-changing platform.

    • Customer support and storefront maintence
    • Social media marketing
    • Complete order fulfillment*

    *Payment processing, product manufacturing, and worldwide shipping are all handled by Soapbox

Let's do something great together

Soapbox presents the unique opportunity to empower your brand, create a new revenue stream, and most importantly, make a difference for a cause you believe in.
